input.sentences: me and my family had a surprise party for our mother tonight
we made sure that every one came out
she was so glad that every one came even if they did n't have gifts
i think every one got a picture with mom tonight
this will be a fun night mom will always remember
output.sentences: The whole family will be there.
It's her birthday and we're surprising her.
Aunt Shelly is even coming all the way from North Carolina.
What a time we're going to have!
